markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alter Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=2542) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Trigger**
You take acid, electricity, or sonic damage.

</column>

---

You focus on your [protean](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=82) forebears to change your energy resistance. The energy resistance you gain from your ganzi heritage changes to match the triggering damage. This change occurs after the damage is dealt.
name: Alter Resistance
